abbrev-alias.description: This zsh plugin provides functionality similar to Vim's abbreviation expansion.

alehouse.description: Contains short aliases for Homebrew commands.

almostontop.description: It clears previous command output every time before new command executed in shell. Inspired by alwaysontop plugin for bash.

z.description: Jump quickly to directories that you have visited "frecently." A native ZSH port of z.sh.

absolute.description: An extremely clean ZSH theme with git branch, git status, battery percentage, NVM node version, and last command exit code.

af-magic.description: A clean ZSH theme with git, mercurial, and virtualenv support.

dracula.description: Dark theme for ZSH and 109+ apps
